document_data.mainbody:
arrior Vuun was a githyanki sentry who guarded the hatchery of Crèche Yllek on Toril in the late 15 century DR.
Vuun had typical yellow leathery skin of his race and an elongated face. He was adorned in a githyanki half-plate and wore a helmet of the same design.
Warrior Vuun, along with other gith of what would become Crèche Yllek, attacked and claimed the Rosymorn Monastery of Lathander in the Western Heartlands sometime before the . Soon after, the function of Crèche was changed as the githyanki war against the mind flayers in Faerûn shifted in balance. During that time, warrior Vuun stood guard in the Crèches hatchery and its youths caretaker Varsh Kokuu. Vuun did not trust istik, but respected them being allowed into the Crèche. Under Vuuns watchful eyes, outsiders were not allowed near githyanki eggs.
